typedef.comment: Defines the minimum PRB allocation for UEs which are power limited
typedef.name: TUlsMinRbPerUe

typedef.comment: 0 .. 150, meaning 0.0 to 15.0, step size is 0.1 CQI steps.
typedef.name: TReCqiLimit

typedef.comment: Indicates the maximum number of HARQ transmissions in UL that is configured for the UE. In non-bundling mode, the valid value range is: 1...7 In TTI bundling mode, the valid values are: 4, 8,12,16,20,24,28
typedef.name: THarqMaxTrUl

enum.comment: This parameter defines the used deployment of the eNodeB.
enum.name: EDeploymentInformation

constant.comment: Number of Message Types defined as Tags. Values 1..16 in use.
constant.name: MAX_MSG_TYPE_TAG

member.comment: Determines which UEs shall be actively sent to UL out-of-sync state provided that bearer combination and applied DRX profile allows for this
member.name: applyOutOfSyncState

member.comment: Factor with which the DRX Inactivity Timer of the DRX profile as applied for a UE is multiplied in order to determine how long to keep a UE UL synchronized following last transmission of new data
member.name: stInactFactor

member.comment: Number of cells in DSP Pool configuration. Valid only in FSMr3, range 1..2.. In FSMr2 set to 0. The same value is given to all cells in a DSP Pool.
member.name: numOfCellsPerBBPool

member.comment: Collects Mcs parameters for MAC
member.name: mcsParams

member.comment: Collects Pdcch parameters for MAC
member.name: pdcchParams

member.comment: Collects scheduling weight parameters for MAC.
member.name: schedulingWeightParams

member.comment: Collects link adaption parameters for MAC
member.name: linkAdaptConfParams

member.comment: Parameters for Open and Closed loop MIMO. Note: Closed loop MIMO is not yet supported (LTE703-a).
member.name: mimoCtrlParams

member.comment: Enable usage of DRX Measurement Reporting Grant for BSR, PHR and aperiodic CQI reporting for UE with DRX enabled
member.name: enaDrxRepGra

member.comment: Enable prioritization of UEs in UL Time Domain scheduling depending on remaining DRX active time.
member.name: enaDrxWactUl

member.comment: Enable/disable prioritization of UEs in Downlink Time Domain scheduling depending on remaining DRX active time.
member.name: enaDrxWactDl

member.comment: Enable/disable prioritization of UEs in Downlink Time Domain scheduling depending on CQI freshness. There is four prioritization categories: new (transmitted during current active time) subband CQI available, new wideband CQI available, old but not exprired CQI available and default CQI in use.
member.name: enaDrxWcqiDl

member.comment: Activate DRX
member.name: actDrx

member.comment: Maximum value of drxLongCycle parameter in the available DRX profiles.
member.name: drxMaxLongCycle

member.comment: Downlink Reference Signals Transmission Power Boost (not modifiable parameter)
member.name: dlRsBoost

member.comment: Value = dlpcfichBoost / 10 Downlink PCFICH Transmission Power Boost
member.name: dlPcfichBoost

member.comment: Value = dlPhichBoost / 10 Downlink PHICH Transmission Power Boost
member.name: dlPhichBoost

member.comment: Parameter to configure whether common channel signalling (SI, paging RACH ) use DCI format 1C(value 0) or 1A (value 1) on PDCCH.
member.name: dlsSciCch

member.comment: defines the minimum UL TBS (segment size) real value = 8*ulsMinTbs
member.name: ulsMinTbs

member.comment: Defines the minimum PRB allocation for UEs which are power limited
member.name: ulsMinRbPerUe

member.comment: Activates support of the following features ARP based Admission Control (LTE534), Smart Admission Control (LTE497) and EPS bearers with QCI 2, 3 and 4 (LTE496).
member.name: actEnhAcAndGbrServices

member.comment: Feature activation flag for DL carrier aggregation. Parameter is set to true only if CAREL is defined for the cell or the cell is pointed by lcrId of CAREL of aggregated cell. Otherwise, (independently on O&M parameter actDLCAggr value) actDLCAggr is set to false.
member.name: actDLCAggr

member.comment: sharePerResourceGroup[i] is the share for CRG i, value is in percent, step 1.
member.name: sharePerResourceGroup

member.comment: Enable SDL records collection on the MAC PS level.
member.name: sdlEnable

member.comment: WMP FDD only.
member.name: srsTriggerParams

member.comment: Beamforming control parameters. TDD only. This is an array of variable length of dimension 0...1. ISAR will generate a numberOfItems element, which has to be set to 1 for BF and to 0 otherwise. NOTE! IE hasBfCtrlParams also indicates that the cell supports beamforming if this field is set as “True”. Otherwise it indicates the cell does’t support beamforming.
member.name: bfCtrlParams

member.comment: TDD only.
member.name: transmModeParams

member.comment: WMP FDD only
member.name: eIcicParams

member.comment: TDD only.
member.name: muMimoParameters

member.comment: Downlink carrier aggregation parameters
member.name: dlCarrierAggrParams

member.comment: Present when dlMimoMode is set to CL MIMO 8x2 with TM9.
member.name: csiRsConfiguration

member.comment: TDD only
member.name: superCellParameters

member.comment: TDD only Specifies the Scell transmission mode for CA configured UEs.
member.name: scellTmSettingWithBf

member.comment: UE specific CQI parameters
member.name: cqiParamsWmp

member.comment: Maximum number of HARQ transmissions in Downlink.
member.name: harqMaxTrDl

member.comment: Maximum number of HARQ transmissions in Uplink.
member.name: harqMaxTrUl

member.comment: TDD only.
member.name: tm8SupportFlag

member.comment: Indicates whether TTI Bundling measurements are activated for the UE.
member.name: ttiBmMeasActivate

member.comment: Set to true, if measurement gaps shall be deleted otherwise set to false. Used in MAC_RadioBearerDeleteReq.
member.name: measGapStopRequired

member.comment: Defines the used gapPattern. Used in MAC_UserSetupReq in TDD when tti bundling is active. Used in WMP in MAC_RadioBearerSetupReq.
member.name: gapPattern

member.comment: Measurement gap offset value. Used in MAC_UserSetupReq in TDD when tti bundling is active. Used in WMP in MAC_RadioBearerSetupReq. Range for EMeasGapOffset_measGapPattern0: 0...39. Range for EMeasGapOffset_measGapPattern1: 0...79.
member.name: measGapOffset

member.comment: Time period for UE inactivity detection; the same value is used for UL and DL direction. Step size 1, unit [s]. Special value 0 means disabled. Used in messages MAC_UserSetupReq and MAC_RadioBearerSetupReq.
member.name: ueInactivityTimer

member.comment: Time period for UE inactivity detection for the purpose of UTRA ANR measurements. Special value 0 is used to disable the timer.
member.name: tInactiveUtraAnr

member.comment: Expiry timer for dedicated random access preamble in case of non-contention based RA. Range is calculated from TRACH_Preamble_Reservation= T304 + T301 + THOoverallDelta. Values are ms. Included in HO case in MAC_UserSetupReq.
member.name: dedicRaPreExpT

member.comment: Indicates the C-RNTI of the UE in the old context in case of intra cell handover or RRC Connection re-establishment. Included when old context in the same cell is available. Used only in MAC_UserSetupReq.
member.name: oldCrntiInTheSameCell

member.comment: If TRUE, LTE MAC PS shall not reserve dedicated preamble for UE.
member.name: intentionalContentionbasedRaEnabled

member.comment:
Parameter identifies the cell resource group to which the UE belongs to. If O&M parameter cellResourceSharingMode is set to 'none' the group Id is always 0.
If the value is different to 'none' LTE UEC shall provide the cell resource group id of the cell resource group to which the UE belongs to.
member.name: cellResourceGroupId

member.comment: This parameter is for padding only and doesn't contain any information
member.name: padding

member.comment: TDD. Max number of layers as defined in chapter 5.2.2.6 of 3GPP 36.212-axx. Present when transmMode == ETransmMode_TM9.
member.name: maxNumOfLayers

member.name: sib8SyncTimePresent

member.name: sib8info

member.comment: TDD specific
member.name: sectorBeamformingMode

member.comment: The parameter defines the downlink sector beamforming weight for sector beamforming solution 1. It is the normalized sector beamforming weight array. DL PHY will do float to fixed point convertion. It is used only on non-beamforming mode channels and signals.TDD specific addition.
member.name: sectorBfWeightforAntenna

member.comment: CQI threshold for switching from single codeword to dual codeword in case of TM8. Value range: 0...160 (0...16), Step size: 1 (0.1) Default: 110 (11)
member.name: bfCqiThUp

member.comment: CQI threshold for switching from dual codeword to single codeword in case of TM8. Value range: 0...160 (0...16), Step size: 1 (0.1) Default: 90 (9)
member.name: bfCqiThDown

member.comment: Rank threshold for switching from single codeword to dual codeword in case of TM8. Value range: 20...40 (1...2), Step size: 1 (0.05) Default: 32 (1.6)
member.name: bfRankThUp

member.comment: Rank threshold for switching from dual codeword to single codeword in case of TM8. Value range: 20...40 (1...2), Step size: 1 (0.05) Default: 28 (1.4)
member.name: bfRankThDown

member.comment: Time period during which channel information is valid.
member.name: timeChInfoValid

member.comment: Activate/de-activate the functionality of fallbacking from beamforming to TxDiv under TM8. Default value: True
member.name: actBfFallback

member.comment: CQI Compensation applied to Measurements when reported RI=2 in dual layer beamforming. Value range: 0...100 (0...10), Step size: 1 (0.1) Default: 30 (3)
member.name: mimoBfdlCqiComp

member.comment: Averaging filter constant for CQI measurements in dual layer beamforming. Value range: 1...20 (0.05...1), Step size: 1 (0.05) Default: 10 (0.5)
member.name: mimoBfCqiAvg

member.comment: Averaging filter constant for RI measurements in dual layer beamforming. Value range: 1...20 (0.05...1), Step size: 1 (0.05) Default: 10 (0.5)
member.name: mimoBfdlRiAvg

member.comment: CQI threshold from single layer BF to TxDiv. Value range: 0...160 (0...16), Step size: 1 (0.1) Default: 140 (14)
member.name: mimoBfslCqiThU

member.comment: CQI threshold from TxDiv to single layer BF. Value range: 0...160 (0...16), Step size: 1 (0.1) Default: 120 (12)
member.name: mimoBfslCqiThD

member.comment: The aggregated gain of sector beam. Actual range: [0 … 10log10(4)] dB, step 0.01 TDD only.
member.name: sectorBeamAggrGain

member.comment: Maximum number of simultaneous users scheduled per DwPTS.
member.name: maxNumUeDlDwPTS

member.comment: Number of consecutive SRS DTX detections triggering radio link failure indication to LTE UEC. Special value 0 means that the feature is disabled.
member.name: nSrsDtx

member.comment: NUmber of consecutive SRS non-DTX detections triggering radio link failure recovery indication to LTE UEC.
member.name: nSrsRec

member.comment: DL scheduler type
member.name: dlsSchedType

member.comment: Filtering constant for the relative signal strength parameters required for the channel aware UL scheduler. The filtering constant shall be determined depending on the SRS settings. ulsSrelFilterCst = (mSRS,0/mSRS,B_SRS)*TSRS mSRS, 0, mSRS,B_SRS see 3GPP TS 36.211 chapter 5.5.3.2 TSRS see 3GPP TS 36.313 chapter 8.2
member.name: ulsSrelFilterCst

member.comment: Gap value if DL scheduler type is DVRB.
member.name: dlsNgap

member.comment: Parameter to configure whether common channel signalling (SI, paging RACH) use DCI format 1C (value 0) or 1A (value 1) on PDCCH. Note that format 1A is used by TDD, for FDD DCI format is always 1C
member.name: dlsDciCch

member.comment: DL frequency domain scheduling algorithm for FD metric calculation. 0 = TTA and 1 = Pfsch
member.name: dlsFdAlg

member.comment: TDD only. (Correct OAM type definition used, when available in SACK.)
member.name: ulMuMimoParameters

member.comment: Initial maximum amount of PRBs in UL. Step 1.
member.name: iniPrbsUl

member.comment: Maximum amount of PRBs for scheduling request. Step 1.
member.name: maxNumPrbSr

member.comment: Time averaging constant for equal throughput criterion in DL. Step 1 TTI.
member.name: dlsTputAvgT

member.comment: Time averaging constant for equal throughput criterion in UL. Step 1 TTI .
member.name: ulsTputAvgT

member.comment: Maximum number of simultaneous users scheduled in a TTI in DL. Step 1. Range depends on Downlink Channel Bandwidth parameter. Range depends on Downlink Channel Bandwidth parameter as follows: FDD: 5.0 MHz => 1...5 10.0 MHz => 1...10 15.0 MHz => 1...15 20.0 MHz => 1...20 TDD: 10.0 MHz => 1...10 20.0 MHz => 1...12
member.name: maxNumUeDl

member.comment: Maximum number of simultaneous users scheduled in a TTI in U. Step 1. Range depends on Uplink Channel Bandwidth parameter. Range depends on Uplink Channel Bandwidth parameter as follows: FDD: 5.0 MHz => 1...5 10.0 MHz => 1...10 15.0 MHz => 1...15 20.0 MHz => 1...20 TDD: 10.0 MHz => 1...10 20.0 MHz => 1...15
member.name: maxNumUeUl

member.comment: PSD power for Single Tx case. Range -60…60 dBm, step 0.01.
member.name: psd0

member.comment: PSD power for Single Tx Diversity and 2x2 MIMO SM. Range -60…60 dBm, step 0.01.
member.name: psdMimo

member.comment: Determines if PRBs partly allocated for transmission of common channels shall be used in dynamic scheduling.
member.name: dlsUsePartPrb

member.comment: Minimum data volume which shall be transferred by a Dummy Grant. Step 80.
member.name: ilMinDatvolUl

member.comment: Improved Latency Reaction Timer in Uplink defines the time in which the UE has to send some useful data after either the initial dummy grant or after previous reception of useful data. Step 100.
member.name: ilReacTimerUl

member.comment: Enables / disables PHICH control algorithm.
member.name: enablePhichCtrlUl

member.comment: Determines time alignment offset limit for the uplink sceduler to stop considering the UE for scheduling. Range 1.5..4, step 0.1, unit 1 μs, internal range 15..40, step 1, unit 0.1 μs
member.name: taOffsetSchedMgn

member.comment: The number of times the Timing Advance Command will be retried before LTE MAC assumes the UE has gone Out-of-Synch. Step 1.
member.name: taCmdMaxRetry

member.comment: Defines lead with respect to the taTimer expiration time for starting to send the periodic Timing Advance Command. Step 1 subframe.
member.name: taTimerMargin

member.comment: Number of consecutive CQI DTX detections triggering radio link failure indication to LTE UEC. Special value 0 means that the feature is disabled.
member.name: nCqiDtx

member.comment: Number of consecutive CQI non-DTX detections triggering radio link failure recovery indication to LTE UEC. Step 1.
member.name: nCqiRec

member.comment: Maximum number of PRBs which may be assigned to the UEs scheduled in DL. Step 1. Note: The value will be rounded up in RRM algorithm to fit with the system bandwidth dependent RGB granularity. Range: 5MHz: 1… 25, 10MHz: 1… 50, 15MHz: 1… 75, 20MHz: 1… 100.
member.name: redBwMaxRbDl

member.comment: Enables/disables restricted PRB assignment functionality in uplink. Not supported (LTE786).
member.name: redBwRpaEnUl

member.comment: Defines the scheduling method which shall be applied in the cell for the UL branch. Two methods can be chosen - the channel unaware UL scheduler and the channel aware UL scheduler. FDD: EOaMUlsSchedMethod_ChannelUnaware = 0, EOaMUlsSchedMethod_ChannelAware = 1, EOaMUlsSchedMethod_InterferenceAwareFdd = 2 TDD: EOaMUlsSchedMethod_ChannelUnaware = 0, EOaMUlsSchedMethod_ChannelAware = 1

member.name: primaryPLMNId

member.comment: Defines CQI compensation value for DL AMC for case where Spatial Multiplexing transmission mode is used but Rank Indication of 1 is received from UE. Applicable in the case when Dynamic Open Loop MIMO Spatial Multiplexing has been configured to use i.e. when dlMimoMode parameter is 3. Step 0.1. Scaled (value*10).
member.name: cqiCompSmRi1Ol

member.comment: Defines CQI compensation value for DL AMC for case where TX Diversity transmission mode is used but Rank Indication of 2 is received from UE. Applicable in the case when Dynamic Open Loop MIMO Spatial Multiplexing has been configured to use i.e. when dlMimoMode parameter is 3. Step 0.1. Scaled (value*10).
member.name: cqiCompTdRi2Ol

member.comment: Defines CQI compensation value for DL AMC for case where Spatial Multiplexing transmission mode is used but Rank Indication of 1 is received from UE. Applicable in the case when Closed Loop MIMO Spatial Multiplexing has been configured to use i.e. when dlMimoMode parameter is 4. Step 0.1. Scaled (value*10). Not supported (LTE703-a).
member.name: cqiCompSmRi1Cl

member.comment: Defines CQI compensation value for DL AMC for case where TX Diversity transmission mode is used but Rank Indication of 2 is received from UE. Applicable in the case when Closed Loop MIMO Spatial Multiplexing has been configured to use i.e. when dlMimoMode parameter is 4. Step 0.1. Scaled (value*10). Not supported (LTE703-a).
member.name: cqiCompTdRi2Cl

member.comment: MCS BLER Target (used for both OLLA and BLER AMC) Step: 1 %
member.name: ulTargetBler

member.comment: Factor for Calculation of the BLER Thresholds for MCS Upgrade / Downgrade by Division and Multiplication with the Target BLER Step 0.05. Scaled (value*20).
member.name: ulamcUpdowngrF

member.comment: Maximum Limit for the OLLA Compensation (Threshold for Fast Upgrade) Step 0.1. Scaled (value*10).
member.name: ulamcDeltaCmax

member.comment: Minimum Limit for the OLLA Compensation (Threshold for Emergency Downgrade) Step 0.1. Scaled (value*10).
member.name: ulamcDeltaCmin

member.comment: Maximum Limit for the OLLA Compensation (Threshold for Fast Upgrade, Emergency Downgrade) Step 0.1. Scaled (value*10).
member.name: ulamcDeltaCini

member.comment: OLLA Compensation Stepsize Up Step 0.05. Scaled (value*20).
member.name: ulamcCStepUp

member.comment: Switch on/off for the BLER Calculation on 1st TB Transmission or on all TBs. 0: disabled, 1: enabled
member.name: ulamcAllTbEn

member.comment: Timer for valid “historical MCS”. Step 100 ms.
member.name: ulamcHistMcsT

member.comment: Timer for MCS degradation due to “temporary UE Inactivity” or DRX/DTX, step 10ms.
member.name: ulamcInactT

member.comment: Threshold determining the AMC switching Period (Number of received TBs with initial Transmission), step 10.
member.name: ulamcSwitchPer

member.comment: ATB averaging period for UE power headroom reports. Step 0.05. Scaled (value*20).
member.name: ulatbPhrAvgF

member.comment: ATB Period in Terms of UL AMC Switching Periods (including EDG and FUG Events). Step 1.
member.name: ulatbEventPer

member.comment: Activates Uplink Link Adaptation and defines Link Adaptation mode.
member.name: actUlLnkAdp

member.comment: When not externally triggered by Outer Loop Link Adaptation (OLLA), the Adaptive Transmission Bandwidth (ATB) algorithm will be activated when the amount of TTI events here defined has been reached. Step size: 5
member.name: eUlLaAtbPeriod

member.comment: Incremental and decremental factor for the Adaptive Transmission Bandwidth's calculation of allocable PRBs. Step 0.05. Scaled (value*20).
member.name: eUlLaPrbIncDecFactor

member.comment: Averaging window for BLER in E-ULA. It is expressed in number of TTI when UE has been actively scheduled. Step size: 5
member.name: eUlLaBlerAveWin

member.comment: Defines how many MCS indexes above the minimal MCS index are required before ATB may increase the amount of allocable PRBs.
member.name: eUlLaDeltaMcs

member.comment: Defines the lowest possible amount of allocable PRBs.
member.name: eUlLaLowPrbThr

member.comment: Defines the lowest possible MCS index before Adaptive Transmission Bandwith (ATB) algorithm may act and decrease the amount of allocable PRBs.
member.name: eUlLaLowMcsThr

member.comment: Activate / Deactivate Outer loop Link Adaptation for PDCCH.
member.name: actOlLaPdcch

member.comment: Defines target BLER of PDCCH and UL HARQ response for initial downlink transmissions for PDCCH Outer Loop Link Adaptation in percents.
member.name: pdcchHarqTargetBler

member.name: fUlLAAtbTrigThr

struct.comment: Note: Parameters related to LTE703-a Closed loop MIMO are not supported.

member.comment: Determines the time frame within only (more than 1) failed PDSCH transmissions have been detected causing indication of radio link failure to LTE UEC. Step size 1. Special value 0 means that the functionality is switched off.
member.name: rlpDetMaxTimeDl

member.comment: Determines the maximum number of failed DL PDSCH transmission attempts until radio link problems are detected. Step size 1. Special value 0 means that the functionality is switched off.
member.name: rlpDetMaxNoDl

member.comment: Defines number of consecutive DL HARQI non-DTX detections causing radio link failure recovery sending. Step size 1.
member.name: rlpDetEndNoDl

member.comment: Defines the number of consecutive PUSCH DTX indications (reliableULtransmissionFlag==FALSE) after which a radio link failure is send. Step size 1. Special value 0 means that the functionality is switched off.
member.name: rlpDetMaxNUl

member.comment: Defines the number of consecutive PUSCH TX indications (reliableULtransmissionFlag==TRUE) after which radio link recovery is reported to LTE UEC. Step size 1.
member.name: rlpDetEndNUl

struct.comment: Note: LTE13-a Rate Capping not supported.

member.comment: If present, means that SIB8DataWithTime field contains a SIB8 structure with longCodeState1XRTT IE to be filled up by MAC. This field defines starting position of the longCodeState IE in SIB8 in bits from the beginning of the message. The length of the longCodeState IE is always 42 bits. Note: It is present when LTE1441 is enabled.
member.name: longCodeState1XRTTPosition

member.comment: Active/deactive the TM8 based MU-MIMO.

member.name: tm8MuMimoCorrThd

member.name: ttiBundlingBlerThreshold

member.name: ttiBundlingDeltaCmin

member.comment: Controls scheduling fairness between UEs with and without activated SCell. If no value is configured (no CAREL exists), the value is copied from the corresponding parameter of CAREL of aggregated cell (linked by lcrId of CAREL of aggregated cell)
member.name: caSchedFairFact

member.comment: Downlink carrier aggregated parameters for PCell. The parameters are configured if subordinate CAREL exists for the cell.
member.name: dlCarrierAggrParamsPCell

member.comment: Downlink carrier aggregated parameters for SCell. The parameters are configured if the cell is linked by lcrId of CAREL of an aggregated cell.
member.name: dlCarrierAggrParamsSCell

member.comment: Cell ID for UE's Scell.
member.name: lnCellIdScell

member.comment: Aperiodic CQI reporting mode.
member.name: cqiAperMode

member.comment: Enables/disables periodic CQI/RI/PMI reporting in UE basis. Note RI reporting can be separately disabled with riEnable even if this parameter is enabled.
member.name: cqiPerEnable

member.comment: Period and offset of periodic CQI/PMI feedbacks. Value is ignored, if cqiPerEnable is disabled.
member.name: iCqiPmi

member.comment: Defines 3GPP rel 10 kind PUCCH resource index for periodic CQI/RI/PMI feedback.
member.name: resourceIndexCqiR10

member.comment: Periodic CQI/PMI reporting mode. Value is ignored, if cqiPerEnable is disabled.
member.name: cqiPerMode

member.comment: Enables/disables periodic RI reporting in UE basis. Value is ignored, if cqiPerEnable is disabled.
member.name: riEnable

member.comment: Period and offset of periodic RI feedbacks. Value is ignored if cqiPerEnable is disabled or if riEnable is FALSE.
member.name: iRi

member.comment: O&M switch for enabling simultaneous ACK/NACK and periodic CQI/RI/PMI report on PUCCH. Value is ignored, if cqiPerEnable is disabled. For Scell, this parameter shall be set according to cqiPerSimulAck of PCell.
member.name: cqiPerSimulAck

member.comment: Number of reported periodic subband CQI feedbacks per DL bandwidth part between periodic wideband CQI/PMI feedbacks, step 1. Value is ignored, if cqiPerEnable is disabled.
member.name: cqiPerSbCycK

member.comment: Defines periodicity factor for periodic subband CQI feedback.
member.name: cqiPerSbPeriodicityFactorR10

member.comment: Sets the aperiodic CQI Reporting Time-Limit by Polling to be taken into account by Scheduler. Step 1 TTI. Defines the minimum time between two consecutive aperiodic CQI/RI/PMI report requests.
member.name: cqiAperPollT

member.comment: Enables / disables aperiodic CQI / RI / PMI reporting in UE basis.
member.name: cqiAperEnable

member.comment: The parameter defines the transport format dependent offset in power control for PUCCH format 3. This parameter is used only when the Cell is configured as PCell in Carrier Aggregation.
member.name: deltaFPucchF3r10

member.comment: The parameter defines the transport format dependent offset in power control for PUCCH format 1bCS. This parameter is used only when the Cell is configured as PCell in Carrier Aggregation.
member.name: deltaFPucchF1bCSr10

member.comment: Controls Target SINR in interference-aware UL-PC: provides a tilt in the balancing between Target SINR in cell-center and Target SINR at cell-edge. Target SINR determines the max. throughput, therefore higher values increase cell-center throughput at the cost of cell-edge throughput, and vice versa.
member.name: ulpcCEBalanceIAw

member.comment: Minimum number of TTIs (ms) that must pass before another UL power decision is made for a UE.
member.name: ulpcMinWaitForPc

member.comment: Minimum quality measure for interference-aware UL-PC. Target SINR for UEs in poor conditions cannot go below a limit defined by this parameter even if they generate higher UL interference.
member.name: ulpcMinQualIAw

member.comment: Controls Target SINR in interference-aware UL-PC: provides an equal shift of Target SINR for all UEs in the cell, regardless of their pathloss ratios.
member.name: ulpcRefPwrIAw

member.comment: Sets an upper limit for RSSI received from a UE. If exceeded, the next power command indicates -1 dB UL power change even if the current UL power is insufficient for reaching Target SINR.
member.name: ulpcRssiMaxIAw

member.comment: TDD specific comment: Activates the transmission of duplicated data streams via different RRHs in downlink, and the combination of uplink signals received from different RRHs. All cell instances in the eNB shall be configured with same for actSuperCell value.
member.name: actSuperCell

member.comment: Parameter Set for Super cell (Correct OAM type definition used, when available in SACK.)
member.name: superCellParSet

member.comment: Present if actDlCAggr is true. Equals to lnCellId of the aggerated cell.
member.name: lnCellIdScell

member.comment: Present if actDlCAggr is true. Equals to lnCellId of the aggerated cell.
member.name: lnCellIdPcell

member.comment: As determined in the PCell. The value is copied from the corresponding parameter of CAREL of aggregated cell (linked by lcrId of CAREL of aggregated cell).
member.name: disableSCellPDCCHOlLa

member.comment: Indicates the maximum number of HARQ transmissions in DL that is configured for each UE at initial access to a specific SCell.
member.name: harqMaxTrDlSCell

member.comment: Parameter identifies the cell resource group of the Scell to which the UE belongs to. If O&M parameter cellResourceSharingMode is set to 'none' the group Id is always 0. If the value is different to 'none' L3 shall provide the cell resource group id of the cell resource group of the Scell to which the UE belongs to.
member.name: sCellResourceGroupId

member.comment: Present if hasCqiParamsScellWmp is true. Must be given when hasCqiParamsScell is also true.
member.name: cqiParamsScellWmp

member.comment: Activate/deactivate UL MU-MIMO
member.name: actUlMuMimo

member.comment: SINR threshold above which UEs can be selected as the candidate users of UL MU-MIMO
member.name: ulMuMimoSinrThreshold

member.comment: The orthogonality factor between two UEs shall be bigger than ulMuMimoOrthThrehold.
member.name: ulMuMimoOrthThreshold

member.comment: Present if secondary cell to be modified. Index of the aggregated cell (secondary serving cell), also passed to UE. Default value: 1 Reserved for future: 2…4
member.name: sCellServCellIndex

member.comment: TDD only.
member.name: newTransmMode

member.comment: This parameter defines the maximum UL sinr offset to serving for candidate sub-cell selection. (Correct OAM type definition used, when available in SACK.)
member.name: candSubCellUlSinrOffset

member.comment: This parameter defines the UL SINR hysteresis on top of UL SINR offset for removing candidate sub-cell. (Correct OAM type definition used, when available in SACK.)
member.name: remCandSubCellUlSinrHys

member.comment: This parameter defines the UL SINR hysteresis to replace candidate sub-cell by a measurement sub-cell. (Correct OAM type definition used, when available in SACK.)
member.name: repCandSubCellUlSinrHys
